results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project ae122e9ba1a4491f849c15df52748f34. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.
model_responses: I will create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project ae122e9ba1a4491f849c15df52748f34.
details: No tool call emitted — model responded with text only

2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
